name: Eyesore (Full Release)
description:
This is a Dodge game like "Soundodger+" Made by Scratch 3.0

Also This is My 2st Largest Project in My life...

Play This Game By Using Scratch 3.0

Controls:

README.txt will show u more

-Z to Shield

-X to Healing (5 Gems)

-Mouse2 to Slow Motion 

-Space to Setting

-R x2 for Death

Don't press F

Minigame Control:

-C for 3 bullets

-V for 5 bullets

-B for Big Shot

-N for lag

-M for lag3r
